Reserve Speciale Botanique d'Ambohitantely. N of Ankazobe on Majunga road. Central plateau forest interspersed with tampoketsa moorland where forest has been cleared, tapia (Uapaca bojeri) abundant, palms and pandanus in valleys, Rubiaceae and Vaccinium common in understory.
